If you're looking for something a bit more recent, Zero Dark Thirty is another great option. It's a gripping and intense thriller that follows the real-life story of the hunt for Osama bin Laden after 9/11. With its strong performances from Jessica Chastain and Mark Valley, it's a movie that will keep you on the edge of your seat!
